sentence.Network_en: He wanted me to know that he still cared for me.
sentence.Network_cn: 他想要我知道他仍爱着我。

sentence.Network_en: Before then many children were cared for in large impersonal orphanages.
sentence.Network_cn: 在那之前，许多孩子被安置在一个缺乏人情味的大孤儿院里。

sentence.Network_en: The woman, who needs constant attention, is cared for by relatives.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个需要长期照料的女人由亲戚们照看着。

list.abs: 九年级英语单词表 ... educate 教育培养 care for 关心；照顾 urge 强烈要求.
动词加介词词组,._百度文库 ... hope/wish for 希望得到 care for 关心，喜欢 beg for 乞求.

auth_sentence.content: These cave-dwellers even cared for the elderly and infirm.
auth_sentence.res_content: These cave-dwellers even cared for the elderly and infirm.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These cave-dwellers even cared for the elderly and infirm.

auth_sentence.content: Essentially you're cared for from start to finish.
auth_sentence.res_content: Essentially you're cared for from start to finish.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Essentially you're cared for from start to finish.

auth_sentence.content: Three eggs are now being cared for in incubators.
auth_sentence.res_content: Three eggs are now being cared for in incubators.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Three eggs are now being cared for in incubators.
